title: ServerWhere
author: ServerWhere
content: Hi,If you need a high-quality 10 Gbps Dedicated Servers or Cloud Servers you are welcome to ServerWhere.com (SW), a leading Cryptocurrency-powered platform for Cloud IaaS & Dedicated Hosting. SW provides Bare-Metal Dedicated Servers in the United States, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Singapore, Spain, Switzerland, Australia, Austria, Canada, Czech Republic, Greece, Italy, Finland, France, Hong Kong, Germany, Malaysia, Thailand, Taiwan, etc.Â US 10 Gigabit Dedicated Server- Cloud-ready, 1x CPU Dedicated Server | Virtualization On-Demand | Install any Linux OS or Windows- Choice of U.S. Data Center: Chicago, Denver, Los Angeles, New York- Intel Xeon E5-2640v3- 64 GB RAM- 2 x 480 GB SSD- 1 Gbps Dedicated Bandwidth (Scale up to full 10 Gbps)- 10 Gigabit Bandwidth Port- 1 IPv4 address- /64 IPv6 subnet- Linux or Windows OS- Remote Management - IPMI 2.0 with KVM over IP- Free Web services management control panel - CyperPanel or CentOS Web Panel- Domain SSL Certificate (per request)- 24/7 Support- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - PRICE: BTC0.0105/mo - Sign Up (price in BTC may vary, depending on the USD/BTC exchange rate)- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Please note that:- Various service customizations are possible.- All dedicated hosting services listed on our websites are on month to month contractsServerWhere.com doesn't accept fiat currencies. Our business model is based on the firm belief that Bitcoin must become an everyday currency and an undisputed and widely recognized global digital currency standard. We also support the other digital currencies, because they give their owners the freedom they need.
